title: (Romance) It's a Joke, Son! 1947 | Kenny Delmar, Una Merkel, June Lockhart | Full Movie

sources.title: (Romance) It's a Joke, Son! 1947 | Kenny Delmar, Una Merkel, June Lockhart | Full Movie
sources.description:
It's no joke that this is tops for laughs!
The first Eagle-Lion film stars Kenny Delmar as Senator Beauregard Claghorn, his "Allen's Alley" resident-character heard on Fred Allen's radio program.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/dVlqCCLvdwA


Original title: It's a Joke, Son! (1947)
This film is subtitled in many languages

Director: Benjamin Stoloff 
Writers: Robert E. Kent, Paul Gerard Smith
Stars: Kenny Delmar, Una Merkel, June Lockhart
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:34 Humorous interactions and discussions about North and South divide, with a touch of political satire.
07:24 A humorous family interaction unfolds as unexpected money arrives, leading to playful banter and misunderstandings.
19:53 Hilarious misunderstandings and antics unfold during a ladies' meeting and a punch preparation.
25:06 Financial support for a truck leads to unexpected political nomination and success.
31:19 Political shenanigans ensue as characters navigate a campaign filled with bribery, threats, and unexpected alliances.
40:27 Political campaign speech filled with humor and satire, leading to unexpected outcomes.
44:02 Investigation into the disappearance of a senatorial candidate leads to speculation and family concern.
51:41 A comedic and chaotic situation unfolds as characters navigate a political campaign and kidnapping.
57:30 Comical events unfold as Bard Claghorn disappears before the election, causing chaos and a victory parade.


@CultCinemaClassics Members-only videos https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
